metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Application Services | Security and Performance
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare provides application services that help you deliver rich user experiences for Internet applications — all while prioritizing security without compromising on performance.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Cloudflare was recently named a Leader in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Web Application and API Protection (WAAP)

psaBanner.text: __CYBERSECURITY ALERT:__ Ensure you're protected against high severity vulnerability in widely used HTTP/2 protocol.

relatedBlades.title: Protect and Supercharge Applications and APIs Everywhere
relatedBlades.subtitle: Making web apps and APIs secure, fast, and productive with a connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.copy:
- Easily protect applications and APIs from abuse, stop bad bots, thwart DDoS attacks, and isolate suspicious activity, all powered by platform intelligence.
- Increase web application performance with infinitely scalable connectivity across every location.
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Ready to talk to an expert? Click here to get in touch.](https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/enterprise/contact/)

features.title: Connected with all networks, enterprises, and clouds
features.description: Cloudflare protects millions of web properties and serves tens of millions of HTTP requests per second on average. We seamlessly connect your apps and APIs hosted in public, private and hybrid clouds, and hosted on-premises.

features.title: Built-in application services platform intelligence
features.description: Cloudflare leverages data from various application and network sources to secure and accelerate web apps and APIs. Security, performance, compliance, and privacy functions are built in without disrupting connectivity.

features.title: Unified and simplified Interface
features.description: Simplify security and accelerate performance of your web apps hosted anywhere with Cloudflare's connectivity cloud. Consolidate with our easy to use and integrated console, deep, request-level analytics, and machine learning assisted policy

relatedBlades.title: Never compromise security for performance
relatedBlades.copy:
- Built natively from the ground up with a composable and programmable architecture. Every service runs from every data center. 
- Content from any source is always a blink away for incredible and connected experiences on any device, regardless of traffic spikes, attacks, and outages.
- Better, more intelligent security through faster protections and data-driven insights from our connectivity cloud.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration

relatedBlades.title: Gartner® named Cloudflare a "Leader" in Web Application and API Protection
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 "Gartner Magic Quadrant for WAAP" report. We believe this recognition validates that we protect against emerging threats faster, offer tighter integration of security capabilities, and deliver powerful ease of use and deployment.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare is a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant™ for WAAP
imageAssetFile.title: Gartner WAAP Magic Quadrant

relatedBlades.title: IDC named Cloudflare a "Leader" in CDN services
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Content Delivery Network Services. In particular, IDC described Cloudflare as "a highly innovative vendor, continuing to invest in advanced technologies such as virtualization, serverless, AI/ML, IoT, HTTP3, 5G and (mobile) edge computing."

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Discover and secure your APIs__ - 92% of organizations faced API attacks in the last year
- __Stop losing users to poor experiences__ - Slow loading websites cost retailers an estimated $2B per year.
- __Protect from denial of service (DDoS) attacks__ - Cloudflare mitigated the largest ever DDoS attack at 72M requests per minute.

imageAssetFile.altText: Illustration of use cases for secure application services

relatedBlades.copy: Enable no-gaps security by making Cloudflare's connectivity cloud a true single pass of unified control. All Cloudflare app and API security, managed from a single console, is delivered from our global edge network of 300 data centers in more than 100 countries for incredible performance, reliability, and unlimited scalability.
relatedBlades.title: Powerful application and API security from the Cloudflare connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website and application security services

features.title: CAPTCHA Alternative
features.description: Turnstile delivers frustration-free, CAPTCHA-free web experiences to website visitors.

relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare makes your web applications perform like never before. With our connectivity cloud, content is always a blink away for incredible experiences on any device, anywhere. We ensure business continuity, regardless of traffic spikes, attacks, and outages.
relatedBlades.title: Superior application performance and user experience everywhere
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website and application performance services
